square.field

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • square.MultiSquare
      • square.field.Field
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MovableEffect
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ForceField

    public abstract class Field
extends MultiSquare
implements MovableEffect
    A field is a collection of several squares, with an effect on moveables.
